item.title: An Introduction to Epidemic Modelling
item.description: Greetings! This is an introduction post. This post will contain the following: What is epidemic data? How do we model epidemic data? What is the process for getting insights from epidemic data?

item.title: How to Model Epidemics
item.description: Hello! Here is a link to the slides of my talk titled: How to Model the Spread of Epidemics This talk was delivered at the PyData Lancaster October 2022 Meetup.

item.title: Sample post
